title: Phat Thai noodles with prawns
ingredients: ['1 tbsp lime juice', '1 tbsp soy sauce', '2 tbsp Thai fish sauce (nam pla)', '24 peeled raw tiger prawns, about 225g in total, thawed if frozen', '250g medium dried rice noodles', '3 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 tbsp Thai green curry paste, or more to taste', '1 tsp toasted sesame oil', '150g baby sweetcorn, halved lengthways', '200g bean sprouts', '200g pak choi, finely shredded', '220g can water chestnuts, drained and sliced', '250ml canned coconut milk', 'TO GARNISH', '1 lime, cut into wedges']
